CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.110', INT_SectorCode__c == '6500', OR( INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'KOMM', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'ORGL' ) ), 'Municipality',
IF( AND( INT_SectorCode__c == '6500', INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.110', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'FYLK' ), 'County',
IF( AND( INT_SectorCode__c == '6100', INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.300', OR( INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'STAT', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'ORGL' )
), 'Pension',
IF( AND( INT_SectorCode__c == '6100', OR( INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.130', INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.120', INT_IndustryCode__c == '72.190', INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.220', INT_IndustryCode__c == '69.100', INT_IndustryCode__c == '84.110' ),
OR( INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'STAT', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'ORGL' )
), 'State',
IF( AND( OR( INT_IndustryCode__c == '35.130', INT_IndustryCode__c == '35.111', INT_IndustryCode__c == '35.140' ), INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'AS' ), 'Electricity Supervision',
IF( AND( OR( INT_IndustryCode__c == '65.120', INT_IndustryCode__c == '65.110' ), INT_OrganizationalStructure__c == 'AS' ), 'Pension', IF( AND( NOT(isBlank(INT_OrganizationalStructure__c)), INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'AAFY', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'ADOS', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'BEDR', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'OPMV', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'BRL', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'ENK', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'ESEK', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'IKJP', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'KTRF', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'PERS', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'REGN', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'REV', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'SAM', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'SÃ†R', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'TVAM', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'UDEF', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'UTBG', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'UTLA', INT_OrganizationalStructure__c <> 'VIFE' ), 'Other', '' ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Organization Category
